price: 安拉应许〔他们胜利〕，安拉并不爽约，但人们大半不知道。
arabic: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waʿda al-lahi lā yukh'lifu al-lahu waʿdahu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
